nodes.text: The Junction was a model of speeder bike produced by Prinawe during the Galactic War between the Galactic Republic and the reconstituted Sith Empire.

The Prinawe Junction was first added to the video game Star Wars: The Old Republic as a reward for those who attended the Community Cantina Tour at San Diego Comic-Con in July 2015. The second in a series of Cantina Tour rewards, the Junction is shareable by players; they can give codes to other players so they can acquire the mount themselves.
